q: Can anyone be a recruiter at Visage?
a: Yes and no. We don't require you to have a background in recruitment but the quality of candidates your refer will be checked carefully.

q: What do I get pay for?
a: You get pay for every suitable candidate you refer against a job on the platform. A suitable candidate is a candidate whose CV matches with the job requirements.

q: How and when do I get paid?
a: We pay you on a weekly basis on the bank account of your choice or via Paypal.

q: How much money can I make?
a: You get paid for every relevant candidate you refer. It depends on how much you work, how quickly and how relevant your candidates are. Our top recruiters make up to $1300 a week.
We don't provide you with any database access. You will need to have your own network and database of candidates.
